Tunable.name: actor_name
Tunable.description: The name of the actor in the ASM.

TunableVariant.name: balloon_data
TunableVariant.description: Information that will be used to create an element that represents thought or speech balloons.

Tunable.name: balloon_delay
Tunable.description: If set, the number of seconds after the start of the animation to trigger the balloon. A negative number will count backwards from the end of the animation.

Tunable.name: balloon_delay_random_offset
Tunable.description: The amount of randomization that added to balloon requests. Will always offset the delay time later and requires the delay time be set to a number. A value of 0 has no randomization.

TunableEnum.name: balloon_type
TunableEnum.description: The visual style of the balloon background.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon that will be used in the balloon. Object Animations elements only support Icon References.

TunableVariant.name: overlay
TunableVariant.description: The overlay of the balloon, if present.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableList.name: begin_states
TunableList.description: A list of states to play.

TunableList.name: end_states
TunableList.description: A list of states to play after looping.

Tunable.name: include_object_children_in_fade
Tunable.description: If True, fade events on the object will apply to the object's children. If False, only the object is affected by the fade event.

TunableVariant.name: initial_state
TunableVariant.description: The name of the initial state in the ASM you expect your actor to be in when running this AnimationElement. If you do not tune this we will use the entry state which is usually what you want.

Tunable.name: repeat
Tunable.description:
If this is checked, then the begin_states will loop until the controlling sequence (e.g. state change on idle component) ends. At that point, end_states will play.
This tunable allows you to create looping one-shot states. The effects of this tunable on already looping states is undefined.

TunableVariant.name: target_name
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, some portion of this object animation expects the actor to interact with another object. The object must be set by whatever system uses the ASM. In and of itself, the Idle component never sets this actor.

Tunable.name: use_surface_height
Tunable.description: If checked, the asm will be provided with the surfaceHeight global parameter, which uses slot height tuning to resolve the height of the target object to a parameter value.
